title: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
subtitle: This Month's GTA+ Membership Benefits
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposit directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (May 11 - June 7) will also receive:

- The Vapid Slamtruck
- The Arcade Drone Station upgrade
- New Chameleon Paints
- Biker helmets and jackets
- Freemode Event bonuses
- Garage discounts
- And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
